Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Bead net beads with scarab
Description: Strung bead net beads of diverse shapes: cylindrical bugle beads in blue and green faience and, at the ends, four flat circular beads in faience and carnelian. Between these last ones we find a faience scarab of very schematic design with four circular openings, probably serving to attach two wings. On the other end of the necklace is a fragment of a blue faience amulet showing the head of a baboon.
